1:
Yahweh reigns; let the earth rejoice;\q let the many coastlands be glad.
\q
2:
Clouds and darkness surround him.\q Righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.


\q
3:
Fire goes before him\q and consumes his adversaries on every side.
\q
4:
His lightning lights up the world;\q the earth sees and trembles.
\q
5:
The mountains melt like wax before Yahweh,\q the Lord of the whole earth.


\q
6:
The skies declare his justice,\q and all the nations see his glory.
\q
7:
All those who worship carved figures will be shamed,\q those who boast in worthless idolsâ€”
\q bow down to him, all you gods!
\q
8:
Zion heard and was glad,\q and the towns of Judah rejoiced
\q because of your righteous decrees, Yahweh.


\q
9:
For you, Yahweh, are most high above all the earth.\q You are exalted far above all gods.
\q
10:
You who love Yahweh, hate evil!\q He protects the lives of his saints,
\q and he takes them out of the hand of the wicked.
\q
11:
Light is sown for the righteous\q and gladness for those with honest hearts.


\q
12: Be glad in Yahweh, you righteous;\q and give thanks when you remember his holiness.
